name: The Wagon
description:
The Wagon

The kingdom of Prussia wants you to get rid of your wagon. Manipulate it around Prussian officials and prove the law is on your side. Based on historical events.

Controls: keyboard

  • Arrow keys / WASD - move
  • R - restart level
  • M - turn music on/off
  • O - go to previous level
  • P - skip level

Made in a week for a Polish jam called PolskiGamedev.pl: Game Jam. The theme was "Polska w grze" (meaning "Poland in game" or "Poland in play").
